item.name: Emerald
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Emerald.

item.name: Silk Honey Grass
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Karanda Ridge, Longleaf Tree Sentry Post, Ancient Fissure, and Marni’s 2nd Lab. It can also be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!
